name: Redian Software
description:
Redian Software is leading open source software development company offering cutting-edge solutions for healthcare, travel, banking and finance, education and Retail.
Our offerings are primarily focused on:
- Business intelligence, Analytics & Reporting
- Enterprise Mobility
- CRM Solutions
- Cloud solutions
- Managed Services & Outsourcing
Redian has partnered up with world's leading technology vendors such as SuiteCRM, Acquia, Amazon and Zoho. Redian Software has delivery headquarter in India and business office in the United States and delighted to have delivered 500+ successful projects and 300 global clients. Redian software is conquering the markets of Open Source Internet Solutions establishing itself as crème de la crème of personalized web development.
